name: BTC Botz
description: BTC Botz are a special edition NFT collection minted on the Bitcoin network. Packed with unique features and utilities, they offer holders opportunities to participate in exciting games, earn rewards, and contribute to a vibrant, growing community. Price and value aside, they are digital collectibles that introduce a new era of interactive experiences in the NFT space. Note that details may vary based on the project's updates and objectives.
